content: it s possible that these are the simplest crocheted baby socks you ll ever find with the crocheted ties they also stay on the wildest of feet materials yarn 50 gr llama soft balls 50gr 150m/164yards you could check yarnsub for an yarn that s easier for you to get your hands on hook 4 0mm scissors needle gauge 16 double_crochet x 9 row = 10x10cm 4 x4 to check your gauge start by chaining 18 1-9 starting in third chain from hook make 1 double_crochet in each st 16 chain 2 turn you square should now be 10x10cm 4 x4 sizes 8 cm & 10 cm
